Author: alphaglucose
Text: I've never lost mine. Even at my lowest BMI of like 16 it was still there. Your period is not an indicator of whether you need help.

Author: thelastunicorn17
Text: Would birth control be an option for you to not have it? Mine stopped after I got the mirena, but other kinds will stop it too, and that would allow that to not get in the way of weight restoration potentially.
